item.title: 02. Lesson Planning with A.I. from Twee.com
item.description:
What's the future of English teaching? Will computers take over the task of teaching our students? Hopefully not soon????. Join Gav & Em and their very special guest Alina from www.twee.com as they explore the topic of using A.I. to create texts, dialogues, and questions for busy teachers. Don't forget to visit www.twee.com to get early access to their amazing A.I. platform and start creating your lessons in seconds.

Demonstration on the A.I. lesson planning tools: https://www... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/13a8ec84/podcast/rss

item.title: Episode 4 - Embers
item.description: BDX seek shelter with precious cargo. Burt finds half a sandwich. Some tidying up is done. Feed: https://pretendfriends.libsyn.com/rss
